#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    unsigned int digits,pages,j,m,k;
    char c[11];
    while(1)
    {
            cin >> c;
            if(strcmp(c,"#") == 0)
              break;
            digits = atoi(c);
            pages=0;m=1;j=9;k=1;
            while(digits >= j*m)
            {
                         pages += j;
                         digits -= (j*m);
                         j = (j*10);
                         m++;
            }
            if(digits % m != 0)
                cout << "Impossible!" << endl;
            else
               {
                     pages += (digits/m);
                     cout << pages << endl;
               }
    }
    return 0;
}
